text: Saeid Seif is an Iranian journalist born on August 15, 1984, in Kermanshah. He founded the news website Didban Iran in 2015 in Tehran. == Detention by the government == Throughout his career, Seif has faced challenges, including pressure from government authorities. On January 7, 2023, he was summoned to Evin Court, detained, and released on bail after eight days. He was arrested again on April 11, 2024, during a court appearance related to his case. == References == Category:Journalists Category:Journalists by nationality Category:Iranian activists Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:People from Kermanshah Province
title: Saeid Seif
